common.appDescription: Browser-based geocoding for Saudi Arabia using DuckDB-WASM

hero.title: Saudi Arabia Geocoding SDK
hero.subtitle: Browser-based geocoding with zero backend dependencies
hero.description: Convert addresses to coordinates and vice versa, entirely in the browser using DuckDB-WASM. Supports 5.3M+ addresses across all 13 Saudi regions.

forwardGeocoding.title: Forward Geocoding
forwardGeocoding.description: Convert addresses to coordinates with Jaccard similarity matching

reverseGeocoding.title: Reverse Geocoding
reverseGeocoding.description: Find nearest addresses from coordinates using H3 tile-based indexing

postcodeSearch.title: Postcode Search
postcodeSearch.description: Ultra-fast postcode lookups using indexed tile mapping

bilingual.title: Bilingual Support
bilingual.description: Full Arabic and English support for addresses and admin names

zeroBackend.title: Zero Backend
zeroBackend.description: Runs entirely in the browser - no server required

playground.title: Interactive Playground
playground.description: Test all SDK features in one place

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to install and use the Saudi Arabia Geocoding SDK

offlineUsage.title: Offline / Airgapped Usage
offlineUsage.description: Use the SDK in offline or airgapped environments by hosting the data files locally

step1.title: Step 1: Download Data Files
step1.description: Download all required Parquet files to your local environment (~158MB total)

step2.title: Step 2: Configure SDK
step2.description: Point the SDK to your local data directory

step3.title: Step 3: Web Server Configuration
step3.description: Configure your web server to serve Parquet files with proper headers

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.note1: Total data size: ~158MB (5 index files + 717 tile files)
notes.note2: You can download only specific tiles for your region to reduce size
notes.note3: Ensure your web server supports HTTP Range requests for efficient loading
notes.note4: The SDK will work completely offline once all files are downloaded

forwardGeocoding.title: Forward Geocoding
forwardGeocoding.addressPlaceholder: Enter an address (e.g., حي الروضة الرياض)

reverseGeocoding.title: Reverse Geocoding
reverseGeocoding.clickMap: Click on the map to reverse geocode

houseNumber.title: House Number Search
houseNumber.description: Search by house number within a region

adminHierarchy.title: Admin Hierarchy
adminHierarchy.description: Get administrative hierarchy for Saudi Arabia coordinates
